creator: grobert@azet.sk
text:
Hi!

I wrote a listener for asplication foo in webapp dir. I put an entry in the app 
web.xml deployment descriptor. I also put context path maping in server.xml. 
sontext path name was same as dir name of app in the webapp directory. When 
Tomcat was started, listener was loaded once. It`s OK. But when I change 
context path name maping from "/foo" to "/myapp" listener is loaded twice. It 
seems that Tomcat loads one listener for the given context path and also one 
listener for each aplication with its directory name. Is this a normal behavior 
or not?

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Yes, this is expected behavior. Disable the host auto deploy if you dont like
the behavior.
